item.title: Judge blocks Trump administration's efforts to defund Planned Parenthood
item.description: A federal judge says Planned Parenthood clinics nationwide must continue to be reimbursed for Medicaid funding

item.title: Pilot arrested on child sex abuse material charges after landing at airport
item.description: Homeland Security officials have arrested a pilot at San Francisco International Airport on charges related to child sexual abuse material
